title: Lost Code Fragments
outcome: Secret hand-drawn system diagrams and annotated code are discovered in Halden's old residence. Lintz and Kova use this evidence to attempt a system rollback, triggering a risky Council power play and unpredictable changes in BCI, risking further disorder.

events.description: Lintz and Kova uncover hidden, hand-written systems diagrams and annotated code beneath wallpaper in Halden’s former residence-office.
Analysis reveals these diagrams describe an undocumented BCI rollback protocol designed for mass data correction in crisis scenarios.
Lintz and Kova argue for immediate activation of the rollback protocol but face resistance from Directorate loyalists who fear total loss of control.
Amid mounting instability, the rollback protocol is secretly executed. BCI subsystems begin reverting scores and undoing prior interventions.

Sudden, unexplained reversals in BCI privileges and restrictions cause chaos, with ghost citizens and established residents forcibly realigned, sparking panic and new political gambits within and against the Council.
